---
title: "integrations_contest.yaml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines an issue template for proposing new integrations in a GitHub repository. It provides a structured format for users to suggest new datasource or machine learning integrations, ensuring that all necessary information is collected in a consistent manner.

## Symbols

### Issue Template
#### Description
This YAML file defines an issue template with various fields to capture information about proposed new integrations.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| name | string | The title of the issue template |
| description | string | A brief description of the template's purpose |
| title | string | The default title format for created issues |
| labels | array | Labels to be automatically applied to the issue |
| assignees | array | GitHub users to be assigned to the issue |
| body | array | An array of form elements defining the structure of the issue |

#### Internal Logic
The template is structured with several form elements:
1. A markdown introduction
2. A checkbox to confirm existing integrations have been searched
3. A textarea for describing the use case
4. A textarea for explaining the motivation
5. An optional textarea for implementation details
6. An optional textarea for additional information

Each form element is defined with specific attributes such as type, label, description, and validation requirements.

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| GitHub Actions | This template is designed to work with GitHub's issue creation system |

### Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| name | string | "üßë‚Äçüîß Propose a new integration" | The title of the issue template |
| title | string | "[Integration]: " | The default title format for created issues |
| labels | array | ["roadmap", "integration"] | Labels automatically applied to the issue |

## API/Interface Reference
| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|:------|:-----|:---------|:------------|
| Use Case | textarea | Yes | Description of the use cases the integration solves |
| Motivation | textarea | Yes | Explanation of how success will be measured |
| Implementation | textarea | No | Technical details of how the integration will work |
| Anything else? | textarea | No | Additional context or references |

This template provides a structured interface for users to submit integration proposals, ensuring that all necessary information is collected in a standardized format.
